participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Reflective and caring, he values his family and has a creative side.
participant_1.background: I am a recording engineer and own my own studio. I prefer being inside. My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. What's up? I'm a 46-year-old single dad with a kid. I live in California, but the recording artist market was dead last year.

participant_2.name: Josh
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, he enjoys spending his weekends dancing and has a laid-back attitude towards life.
participant_2.background: I don't care about fashion. I went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. I hate the color orange. I dance on the weekends.
